objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#8FCEF9'/><circle cx='540' cy='1080' r='700' fill='#A48EE3' opacity='0.7'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='150' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.3' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='900' cy='250' r='80' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.4' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='150' cy='500' r='100' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.3' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='850' cy='600' r='120' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.4' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='300' cy='750' r='70' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.3' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='600' cy='150' r='60' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.4' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='950' cy='450' r='50' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.3' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='400' cy='400' r='90' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.2' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='730' cy='800' r='110' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.2' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/></svg>

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant banner features a playful and energetic design that highlights a bubble solution product. The background is composed of pastel blue with overlaying semi-transparent white and lavender circles representing bubbles, adding a fun and whimsical atmosphere. A large purple circle dominates the lower half, grounding the product image ("product_image"), which is centrally placed. The main heading ("heading") is bold and purple, with a green subheading ("subheading") underneath it, both in a fun, chunky font. The tagline ("tagline") sits just below in smaller purple text. The price ("price") is clearly highlighted in purple below the product, followed by a purple call-to-action button ("cta_background") with white "SHOP NOW" text ("cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: `#8FCEF9`
- Lavender: `#A48EE3`
- Bright Purple: `#6B0FA9`
- Lemon Green: `#5ECF32`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a vibrant, playful color palette ideal for a children's advertisement banner. Dominating the design is a translucent electric green liquid (#6FF573), blending energy and freshness. The “Gazillion” text is outlined with bright green (#A1FF0A), bold purple (#662D91), and a yellow-orange accent (#FF9900), creating a striking, layered effect. The background label is a deep purple (#912BA1), contrasting with soft bubble blues (#B3D9F5) and pastel highlights. The cap is vivid purple (#8000A0), complementing the label. These bright, high-saturation colors not only enhance visibility but also convey excitement and fun, perfectly suited for a bubbly, energetic theme.
